text: Duvar is a 1983 Turkish-French drama movie directed by Yılmaz Güney and starring Tuncel Kurtiz, Zeynep Kuray, Ayse Emel Mesci Kuray, Malik Berrichi, Nicolas Hossein, Ahmet Ziyrek, Jacques Dimanche, Jean-Pierre Colin, Ali Berktay. ==Other websites== * Category:1983 drama movies Category:Turkish movies Category:French drama movies Category:Turkish-language movies Category:Movies set in Turkey Category:Movies directed by Yılmaz Güney
title: Duvar (movie)
